snippet: Checking in on "Billy the Kid," the latest installment of PBS's "American Experience" series.
abstract: Checking in on "Billy the Kid," the latest installment of PBS's "American Experience" series.
lead_paragraph: Billy the Kid lived his brief life at precisely the right moment to make him an excellent candidate for an installment of "American Experience" on PBS. It was an era of the kind of enthusiastic newspaper coverage that leads to outsize legends. And it was an era that left a sparse but compelling photographic record, poetic images of hard-living men and prettily posed women who come alive yet remain tantalizingly distant.
